data.title: Medical Store
data.description: At Medical Store, we procure all our medicines from only certified and registered pharmacies in Pakistan such as Kausar Medicos, Tayyab Medical, Time Medicos, etc.

data.title: Restaurant Website
data.description: My fast food restaurant project aims to revolutionize quick dining with a focus on fresh, locally sourced ingredients and sustainable practices.

data.title: Cards
data.description: Perfect for barbecue aficionados, it combines the joy of outdoor grilling with the convenience of a subscription service, promising a culinary journey through bold flavors and hearty indulgence.

data.title: Pop Over
data.description: Facilitated a seamless upgrade of the client's e-commerce website from Magento version 2.3 to 2.4.3-p1, while concurrently delivering valuable contributions such as implementing minor updates and resolving bugs. The successful upgrade.

data.title: Portfolio Website
data.description: Effectively upgraded the client's Magento website from version 2.3 to 2.4.3-p2 while concurrently optimizing their website architecture. I successfully separated custom modules into separate API, Frontend, and Admin modules. I completed several minor modifications providing efficient shopping experience for customers.

data.title: Hover Effects
data.description: Contributed to the success of the client's e-commerce business by leading a successful upgrade from Magento version 2.3 to 2.4.5-p1. Additionally, I developed a dual checkout functionality that enables clients to place shared orders, improving the efficiency and convenience of the checkout process. I also designed a captivating landing page.

data.title: Tooltip
data.description: Successfully migrated the client's website from Drupal to Magento 2.4.5-p1, ensuring a seamless transition and improved website functionality. Additionally, I developed custom shipping methods that were tailored to the client's specific needs, ultimately resulting in a more user-friendly and efficient checkout process for their customers.
